branchCategory.name: ATEX
branchCategory.description: <P>Intrinsically safe SY valve is designed to be used in hazardous location by limiting the energy that could cause ignition when used with properly sized barriers. </P>

branchItem.name: 5000 Series
branchItem.description: <P>Intrinsically safe SY valve is designed to be used in hazardous location by limiting the energy that could cause ignition when used with properly sized barriers. </P>
branchItem.bullets: <ul> <li>15mm valve width <li>Maximum Cv = 0.64 <li>Available as 2-position, 3-position <li>Coil voltage: 12VDC, power Consumption: 0.52 <li>This valve is only compatible with the legacy SY manifold </li></ul>
